snippet.title: Drakantos | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Drakantos is a free-to-play MMORPG under development with more than 20 playable heroes, competitive PvP modes, and hundreds of PvE missions! 

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2454980?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=comingup&utm_medium=official-teaser

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/drakantos

#pixelart #mmorpg #indiedev #gameplay
